subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark DiFelice seemed destined to go unnoticed. But with a 3-0 record and 0.98 earned run average in 17 appearances, the journeyman pitcher has been getting a lot of attention recently.
snippet: Mark DiFelice seemed destined to go unnoticed. But with a 3-0 record and 0.98 earned run average in 17 appearances, the journeyman pitcher has been getting a lot of attention recently.
